articles.title: Starbucks to close last stand-alone Capitol Hill location next month - KOMO News
articles.description: Starbucks said it will close its store at Broadway East and East Denny Way in Seattle's Capitol Hill neighborhood on Dec. 9.

articles.title: Zoom shares down 90% from peak as pandemic boom fades - Reuters
articles.description: Shares of Zoom Video Communications Inc (ZM.O) have tumbled about 90% from their pandemic peak in October 2020 as the former investor darling struggles to adjust to a post-COVID world.
articles.content: Nov 22 (Reuters) - Shares of Zoom Video Communications Inc (ZM.O) have tumbled about 90% from their pandemic peak in October 2020 as the former investor darling struggles to adjust to a post-COVID wo… [+1770 chars]
